text: The 2015 FC Kaisar season is the club's fifth season back in the Kazakhstan Premier League, the highest tier of association football in Kazakhstan, and 20th in total. Kaisar will also take part in the Kazakhstan Cup. In July Dmitriy Ogai resigned, with Fyodor Shcherbachenko appointed as his successor on 6 August. ==Squad== ==Transfers== ===Winter=== In: Out: Kirgistanac za jači napad Radničkog! at FK Radnički Niš official website, 13-2-2015 ===Summer=== In: Out: ==Competitions== ===Kazakhstan Premier League=== ====First round==== =====Results summary===== =====Results by round===== =====Results===== ===== League table ===== ====Relegation Round==== =====Results summary===== =====Results by round===== =====Results===== ===== League table ===== ===Kazakhstan Cup=== ==Squad statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== |- |colspan="14"|Players away from Kaisar on loan: |- |colspan="14"|Players who appeared for Kaisar that left during the season: |} ===Goal scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;
